(Where is Zardus? Just for my info)

::Magmatron/Cerberus::

    He recalle=
d the worker drones to thier eggs. The two in the ship were done with weapo=
ns and returned to the eggs, the one sent to get the new Destron was now on=
 it's way back.
    Magmatron reached over to a comm system. He typed in a =
few buttons and a direct encrypted comm line went to the signal of Zardus.
=
    "Lord Zardus," Magmatron began. "Where to begin? Let me see. I wish for=
 the Destrons to be in an alliance with your Alliance. All the other groups=
 that we have attempted to have been weak and simple minded. If you accept =
this is the one thing I wish for to happen: You allow us to remain our own =
Faction, I will send my emissary, Cerberus to talk and live with you. But t=
he rest will remain here. I hope to here a responce from you soon, Lord Zar=
dus. Emperor Magmatron out."

------=_NextPart_000_003B_01C05472.6A082EE0
